title: Ticket #5974: Reread credmon's pid file periodically
description:
Daemons that interact with the credmon read the credmon's pid file the first time they interact with it, and cache the value indefinitely. If the credmon exits and restarts, the daemons can no longer signal it, and may end up signalling some innocent process that gets the reused pid.

The credmon client code should re-read the pid file periodically to avoid this problem.
check_ins: 2016-Oct-20 16:30   Check-in [49456]: Re-read credmon's pid file periodically. #5974 If the credmon exits and restarts, this ensures its clients quickly notice and start talking to the new process. (By Jaime Frey )
